title: China Fuzhou Riverside City Break with Indoor Swimming Pool
description: Along the banks of the mighty Minjiang River in the enchanting city of Fuzhou is Crowne Plaza Fuzhou South, an IHG Hotel. Spend evenings wining and dining at Chef's Kitchen, an all-day dining restaurant serving up mouthwatering meals from the open show kitchen, before migrating to the Art Lobby Lounge for cocktails and dessert. The indoor swimming pool is an inviting space for moments of solitude, while the fitness centre is a modern workout zone.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Fuzhou South, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.167 Minjiang Avenue, Cangshan District, Fuzhou, China

title: Centrally Located Fuzhou City Luxury with State-of-the-Art Fitness Centre
description: Find yourself in the heart of China's southeastern capital city when you stay at InterContinental Fuzhou, an IHG Hotel. This centrally-located hotel has redefined the city's skyline with its innovative design, and features contemporary interiors to match. During your stay, discover the ultra-modern fitness centre with a state-of-the-art gym, 156sqm heated indoor swimming pool and a yoga studio. After working up an appetite, enjoy dinner at any of the three onsite dining venues.
offer_address: No.108 Guangda Road, Taijiang District, Fuzhou, 350005, China

title: Elegant Fuzhou Riverside Retreat with Three Onsite Restaurants
description: Discover the beautiful traditional city of Fuzhou with a stay at Crowne Plaza Fuzhou Riverside, an IHG Hotel, resting on the banks of the Min Jiang River. Explore the city like a local to uncover its unique architecture, tea traditions and charming heritage alleyways lined with lanterns. Take a moment to breathe in the mountain air with a trip to Gu Mountain, before returning to this sophisticated hotel to enjoy an opulent dining experience at one of the three onsite restaurants.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Fuzhou Riverside, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 100-1 Jiangbin West Avenue, Taijiang District, Fuzhou 350002, China
